desc:
There appears to be discrepancies in what was verified by Judgements verifiers yesterday, I have checked the capturers invoice report and it showed zero verified by Tebogo and I ran an hourly verification report and it pulled stats for Tebogo. We need to verify how much work was done by both Tebogo Dithipe and Fiona Klassen as judgement verifiers yesterday, Neil has also indicated that only 140 went out to the clients and the hourly verification report shows 880 verified by both verifiers yesterday. Please can this be investigated?

Logged by Gordon
name: CW - GCCW180 - Judgments verification report
